questionList.solution: `a^x=b` rewritten as a log is `log_a b = x`. Therefore, `5^x=5`, so `x=1`.
`a^x=b` rewritten as a log is `log_a b = x`. Therefore, `3^x=27`, so `x=3`.
`a^x=b` rewritten as a log is `log_a b = x`. Therefore, `4^x=64`, so `x=3`.
`a^x=b` rewritten as a log is `log_a b = x`. Therefore, `5^x=25`, so `x=2`.
`a^x=b` rewritten as a log is `log_a b = x`. Therefore, `3^x=81`, so `x=4`.
